website_summaries.verdict: It's a well-made model that has a lot to offer. Comparably priced to other models, but some have more features.
pros: Has a spacious, removable storage compartment and separate pocket
Its flip-away changing table accommodates babies up to 25 pounds
cons: Some consumers found it difficult to put together
It's also on the heavy side

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bed for my first grandchild. He is nine months old now and 25 pounds, and this bed still works just fine. Very high quality bed and comes with a soft waterproof sheet (I bought a second sheet from Joovy to have an extra). The side pockets are convenient for diapers and the little shelf is nice to hold wipes, noise machine, etc. It is very sturdy and I am very, very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VA G

customer_reviews.title: TOXIC MATERIAL
customer_reviews.text: TOXIC MATERIAL! I’m so annoyed. The concept is great but the material not only smells like a cow pooped in the respective room where you place the joovy due to its horrible materials, the material itself is all made of polyurethane foam and is not good for infants to breathe. I’m disgusted that no where on amazon or on joovy’s site there is zero mention of the products materials. It’s disgusting. The smell is so bad I couldn’t believe it. I’ve had a joovy before (5 years ago) and it definitely did not have this horrid-fertilizer smell.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Morales

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble & very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly::::::::: I’m nearly 39 weeks pregnant and I was able to put this together in less than 30 minutes. To those people who are having issues putting it together did not look at the diagrams or instructions. Or maybe had. Defective product. While the playyard isn’t “simple” to put together, it definitely wasn’t difficult. A lot of the clips that go on the side are stiff to click into place, which definitely makes me feel like this is a very sturdy product. Changing table ::: Clicks on firmly for support! :::::: will update when we actually use it
customer_reviews.author: A.Gonyea

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have been more pleased!! It's easy to open up, and tear down with many options!! I love the black, and how easy it is to work. No complaints!! This is my 4th child and I've had many different brands. Joovy by far is the best!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst playard on the marketq
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and, ultimately, returned it. Here are the reasons why: 1) Smell - upon initially unpacking the smell was so bad and strong that we couldn't even be in the same room as it 2) Opening/Closing - does not open and close with ease. I am not sure how they make it look so easy in the videos, but it simply does not open and close easily. Getting each arm to lock when opening and then unlock with closing up is an ordeal. Furthermore, getting it to completely fold with all four legs tucked in is also incredibly difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen County Resident

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS A NIGHTMARE! AVOID AT ALL COSTS.
customer_reviews.text: I can't even get the side rails to lock. Like, three of them are bent. Impossible. The instructions don't tell you HOW to do anything, they just tell you to do it. like, the photo shows you a locking mechanism that you can't see because it's stitched into fabric. So what the hell am I supposed to do with that. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. I have house guests coming over in a couple of days with a baby and need to apparently buy something other than this piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect- great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Comes with a nursery table and side attachment for diapers, wipes and etc. It’s not bulky nor small- it’s a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Gurrola

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is not as easy as it sounds. The assembly instructions of popping up the sides by yanking with force doesn’t seem sustainable. It also creates pinch points. The easy step assembly isn’t so easy. I think there needs to be future design updates. The mattress included is in adequate and to place the unit back into is original bag with all pieces would probably take further review.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece but Bassinet insert very unstable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this piece. I specifically bought it so I could use the bassinet insert and use the underneath part for storage. Unfortunately, bc of the design with the bowed sides it make the bassinet drop in VERY unstable. When I set my baby in to sit down and play she just falls over bc it so wobbly. Overall, it’s a quality piece. Love the style and side storage pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy play yard
customer_reviews.text: This play yard was a bit difficult to setup as well as collapse for travel. I’m sure once I’ve done it a few more times I will know what I’m doing. That being said, this play yard is super sturdy. I love the changing area and that it can detach but still hang from the side of the play yard. I also love the caddy area. I have it loaded with items for baby. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. We have been using this as a main bed ever since we set it up. We have loved having it. However, when we finally got to go on our first trip with the baby it was faulty and would not fold up properly. 4 people tried but the long sides would not colaps. We had to pack it in the car half folded. The trip was nice but very inconvenient carrying a half folded pack'n'play....
customer_reviews.author: Valarie

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the the room by Joovy arrived pretty fast. It was as described assembled it yesterday it was very easy to assemble materials are great. Colour is lovely. I watched the video on how to assemble on amazon just below the description. And it was easy dont know why some people here said it difficult. Overall I love it.
customer_reviews.author: prettyama

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT BUT DON’T HIDE THE DIRECTIONS!
customer_reviews.text: The JOOVY Pack and Play is a wonderful product. It is sturdy and serves the purpose for which it was bought. The bassinet part of the play yard is just perfect. When baby gets older it can be used for the play yard. Only one problem. The assembly directions were hidden in one of the pockets! My husband didn’t see them so we just used U TUBE. 😂
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This has been perfect for us. I wanted something safe my baby could nap in on the main level of out home. The changing table is great and I love that it moves out of the way. I found it easy to assemble and breakdown. The sheet that comes with is nice and plush yet safe for baby. It's also attractive so not too much of an eyesore in our living room. I'd definitely recommend this isnyorje looking for a pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy, bulky and not for traveling
customer_reviews.text: This thing weighs SO much it took two people to carry. It’s huge and bulky and I almost broke a finger trying to set it up. If you aren’t going to be moving this then the size might be appealing to you but to call this “traveling” is ridiculous. I returned it And got something easier to open and lighter. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more on something that clearly says is easy to open and break down
customer_reviews.author: PeachyPi

customer_reviews.title: I am a fan of this playard!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of this pack & play! Love how it looks & an even bigger fan of the diaper storage on the side, lots of space! The only reason I’m giving it 4 stars is because one of the button clamps for the changing table broke pretty easily and also because the dimensions of the playard are bigger than most so there are no mattresses that are able to fit the entire bottom of the playard and it’s rather hard down there for baby so that’s unfortunate but overall satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Zariah

customer_reviews.title: JOOVY HIGH QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE OWNED JOOVY PRODUCTS FOR YEARS, JOOVY USES HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS, AND HEAVY DUTY FRAMING FOR STURDINESS, NOT A LOT OF FANCY FRILLS, GREAT FOR LARGE SIZE INFANTS AND TODDLERS. STORAGE BAG AND CONTAINMENT ALLOWS CLEAN SAFE STORAGE WHILE TRAVELING AND WHEN NOT IN USE, ON THE HEAVY SIDE BECAUSE OF HEAVY DUTY BUILD QUALITY, IT COMES COMPLETE WITH MATTRESS AND WATER PROOF SOFT SHEET. PRICE IS LOW FOR THE QUALITY AND DESIGN. ONLY BRAND I WILL PURCHASE IN THE PLAY YARD AND NURSERY FOR GRAND KIDS.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing! Had a difficult time pushing the sides down during assembly, but I read some reviews and realized I needed to have the bottom pushed down all the way (I think that was the trick, it's been a couple months now). I'm not sure I would recommend it for travel use, but it has everything we need for use at home. We didn't even buy a changing table since this one is so handy and easy to use. Very sturdy, and loved that it came in black (gender neutral, not loud or crazy patterns).
customer_reviews.author: npkz

customer_reviews.title: Seemed too good to be true and that’s cause it is
customer_reviews.text: Seemed too good to be true and that’s cause it is, it is HORRIBLY PAINFUL TO ASSEMBLE I would have gotten something else if I knew this would be happening. Here I am sweating and cursing and videos later and this, thing won’t click into place if I can’t assemble in the next hour I’m returning this is RIDICULOUS and I’m not the first to review it by the way it’s assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Best Pack N Play I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice pack n play! It's sturdy, easy to put together, and isn't totally unsightly for the room it'll be in. I will say it is larger than other pack n plays, and we have to collapse it fully to move it room to room as it will not fit thru standard 2' 8" door frames. It is lovely, the parent tray is great, and I'm hoping baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: kt_hanamann

customer_reviews.title: Item Damaged/Defective
customer_reviews.text: If the item we received wasn’t defective, I’d say it’s probably incredibly durable and easy to assemble. Right out of the box, one of the snaps on the changing pad is missing, causing a corner of it to sink and become unstable, and one of the short legs on the bottom is detached from the frame. This made it really flimsy and difficult to flatten out. We are returning for one that’s not defective, but it was a pain to have to assemble it just to take it down and pack it all back up. Looks really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Read reviews first to learn set up for the first time!
customer_reviews.text: I registered for this play yard without realizing some of the extra perks it came with! The bassinet feature is amazing and will be super helpful when baby comes! We also really like the swing away changing table and storage shelf. Only thing is I wish I would've watched the video here on amazon first before setting up.. wouldve saved me some hassle! But now that it's been set up once, itll be a piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: NOT happy about the hard buckle in the mattress, but otherwise we like it. Can this be fixed??
customer_reviews.text: We love this playard! We went with the gray. It is bulkier than others, but we still like it. The biggest CON: when we lowered the mattress to the bottom, it buckled and created a hard ridge in the middle because the collapse button pushes it up. We’ve had to put a few blankets down so that it lays flat. I’m NOT HAPPY about this. Is this normal for this playard??
customer_reviews.author: Jon Courville

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a play yard with a changer, a safe place for him to sleep that was raised up (not a bassinet he’d grow out of quickly) and a simple look. This is everything we wanted! Fits through doorways assembled so we haven’t had to disassemble it. However, I originally assembled it at 36 weeks pregnant with no problems. Easy to assemble if you can follow directions.
customer_reviews.author: LilShog

customer_reviews.title: Great Playard
customer_reviews.text: I like this playard. It's easy to set up, it comes with a bag for travel. I like that there is a space you can use to organize diapers and other baby stuffs. It also comes with a changing pad and a back pocket that can be used to store baby stuffs as well. The item is sturdy and safe. I only find the playard mat to be a little low leveled.
customer_reviews.author: Milady Di G

customer_reviews.title: Joovy Room
customer_reviews.text: This is actually really easy to set up and very well made. I would not travel with it simply because it is kinda heavy but you could if you needed too. It’s acting as our bassinet/crib for our baby and so far I love it. It’s simple with no electronics and relatively compact but has good storage. I’m very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Love the changing table and the organizer on the side. Game changing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this pack and play every single day. The changing table is life changing. The only thing I want is the option to have changing table covers to put on. It was very easy to put together. The instructions weren't very clear, but common sense is really all you need to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Setup is difficult
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t easy to setup. One of the side bars didn’t wanna click in. My husband even had trouble setting it up. Luckily, he got it all setup. I don’t think we’ll be using this for traveling though. Too much work. They make it look easy in the videos, but it really isn’t that easy. Nice pack n play though.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great play yard!
customer_reviews.text: As far as the reviews go saying it’s difficult to assemble and disassemble I’ve never had a play yard that was easy to assemble and disassemble lol! It wasn’t difficult at all as far as play yards go. It seems very sturdy and has a very simple design. Perfect for bedside sleeping for bassinet use.
customer_reviews.author: Franki

customer_reviews.title: Not horrible, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: The product overall in theory was good, however, it was extremely difficult to assemble, and the bassinet seemed very unstable. The appearance and size were good, but once it was opened it had an EXTREMELY strong chemical scent that I could not seem to get rid of to matter how much I tried to air it out. I ended up returning this in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep at my parents house when my daughter and I go to visit. It’s been so useful to change her and put her down for her naps in here. The only con is that it’s a slight pain to setup and it’s difficult to change and clean the lining of the pad at the bottom of the pack and play.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Sugarman

customer_reviews.title: Great option
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sleek pack and play. It’s sitting in our living room and it’s not an eye sore it fits in with everything else. We use it everyday to change diapers and play in it. It was a bit of a challenge putting it together but I think all pack and plays are challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral colored playard
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use in our living room as a changing/napping station for our 3rd child. We have not had the baby yet but it seems sturdy and it was easy to assemble. I love that it is neutral colors and not such an eye sore.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle M

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a little more difficult than anticipated to take down, but otherwise, it's a great product. Watch the videos on YouTube and practice a little before you travel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product. VERY EASY TO ASSEMBLE FOR US.
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing. it is worth the buy, have been using it for the past six months and have encountered no problems. i was worried about getting it assembled due to most reviewers complained about that. let me just say my bf had a lil fight with it at first, then i showed him the you tube video of how the guy snapped it in place in seconds. he followed suit and it was assembled in seconds, even he could not believe how easy it was.
customer_reviews.author: Ian G.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was great, bought it before my son was born, by the time he was born the return date cancelled. Here I am, my son is 5 months old. We break it down to being with us on a trip. Far from home, late at night and the dang thing won’t click. First the two end sides. Then the rest of it. So now I have no where for my son to sleep. Thank you joovy.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nieves

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable substitute for a crib but NOT a light weight play yard like a pack n play
customer_reviews.text: I love this for a crib substitute I would NOT recommend if you're looking for a light travel friendly play yard. This is not easy to pack up. But I do love the sleek design for his nursery. The little changing station is handy too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this playpen! High quality and practical
customer_reviews.text: Watch the YouTube video on how to assemble it. I had to watch it over 3 times because it is not intuitive. Once you learn how to assemble it, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and I was hesitant to get it based on some of the reviews that it hard to put together. I just went from out of the box to basically fully set up in. Less than 7 minute, without even needing to read the directions. I don't know what people are talking about but it W a very easy and straightforward. There is one snap and the pop in parts on the changing table I couldn't quiet get (I've got a thumb injury so it needs a bit more pressure and coordination than I have at the moment) but I don't see being a problem in the future. Very happy so far!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette E.

customer_reviews.title: I’m throwing this away
customer_reviews.text: This is my third child and holy moly it’s a nightmare of a pack n play. We travel a ton so I spent the extra money on a nice unit. It’s sturdy and well made... but horrible to breakdown. I think I’m going to order a new one and throw this away soon
customer_reviews.author: LindsayMcC

customer_reviews.title: Four stars
customer_reviews.text: Pros- I love that it’s not tacky. Also the mat seems more comfortable than other pack and plays. My daughter sleeps much longer in this one. Cons-I wish that the storage system was set on the bottom or the front instead of the sides. I wish the changing table was a little bit more deeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi0424

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: The worst design! All 4 sides do not lock properly and are impossible to see where the latches are because they are covered with fabric. Spent over an hour trying to lock all 4 sides, which should be a quick thing! WAY TOO MUCH WORK to put this thing together... I don’t know about you, but I’m looking for something convenient that is a quick easy set up. Waste of time. Spend the extra money on something with quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together and great quality product! Sheets difficult to find.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Orido

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but difficult to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product but is not easy to assemble or break down. I appreciate the quality but to put it together and then break it down is quite an ordeal.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUUL
customer_reviews.text: eASY AND PLEASAND TRANSATION JUST A DESCRIBED HAPPY WHIT THE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Mireya F. Cutie

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have had from 7 kids in our family. This was the easiest to put together. If you read the instructions it tells you how to lock the bottom in place with out a fight. Love the storage and changing table. Easily place sleeping baby in the lowest setting with out waking.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O.

customer_reviews.title: The all black is very elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. It includes a waterproof mattress cover that’s very comfortable too. The storage unit that attaches to the side is very spacious and very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Rios

customer_reviews.title: Love it :)
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to set up. I love the storage space. Comes with a protective sheet for the pad which was a nice surprise. The only issue I have with it is how heavy it is. I really struggled carrying it. If you want a pack n play for traveling this is not the product for you. Luckily I only purchased to keep in my living room and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Easy set up and take apart
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Easy set up and take apart. We bought a Gracco pack n play and returned for this one. This product is a definite buy for any patents. Added sheet is also awesome feature. Will be buying future goovy products from now on.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend. great product and so glad I purchased it. my little man is 5 months old and I still use it daily. the changing station is sturdy and still supports little man with no give.
customer_reviews.author: paigeb

customer_reviews.title: Fine, well designed crib! Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room in this great unit. The added accessory shelves and changing table with safety belt make this a winner. Especially for limited space.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful baby item
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law picked this out for her baby. I gave it to them for a shower gift. It is very sturdy and looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wurst

customer_reviews.title: Smells
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with quality, but it smells. Sounds weird, but once un-packaged the product has a bad odor, not a plastic/manufacturer smell either. It’s going away after a few weeks though...
customer_reviews.author: R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. This is a sturdy and well made play yard and works well as a crib.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and well-made. It is a struggle to set up and fold down, probably because the frame is stronger than comparable brands. Not a portable as lighter models, but great to use at home and will probably last forever. I especially like the end pockets. They are well-organized and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Edmos

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Getting it put together was a struggle for about 2 mins and then a simple YouTube video sowed is how to do it. It’s incredibly sturdy and I’m super happy I went with this one over the Garco pack n play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived damaged. It was missing the parts needed to attach the parenting shelf. And worst of all, it was nearly impossible to setup and take down. In conclusion, this product was not worth the tape that I used to pack it back up and ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Dont think to hard on this one it's great at a great price and it's all black beside the changing table I love all black stuff and it's hard to find that for baby stuff so I had to get this for my baby girl and it goes with all my furniture lol! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a crib
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. I like that it has a little section to store diapers and wipes. I use the little storage section for diapers and the top part of it to place my wipe warmer. I’ve always used play pens for my sons to sleep in during their first year of life. I’ve had a crib before but they weren’t mobile, light weight and my son never liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We use this as our crib and I absolutely love it!!! It’s do durable and the color doesn’t fade!! Easy to clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Chantell

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful and well made play pen!!! Worth the money!! If you need to move it without collapsing it, the wheels on one side make it so easy to maneuver! There is plenty of room for my son to play in it! It is amazing and I’m glad I found it. I love the Joovy brand!
customer_reviews.author: G. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Changing Table a lifesavor
customer_reviews.text: Great size and height. I bought it so i can have a changing table attached for small spaces. Only downside would be that its VERY difficult to take down.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Missing the changing table
customer_reviews.text: Received mine today. Was very much looking forward to it. Assembled fine but there was no changing table :(
customer_reviews.author: Stephythegreat!

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and shape. The side shelves are perfect for things you need to grab quickly like wipes and diapers. Very study.
customer_reviews.author: fhudson

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup
customer_reviews.text: It’s a lot bigger than it looks in the picture and the setup took about 45 min. All I need now is some blankets and it is ready for baby boy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble & good price! Charcoal grey looks good with everything!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Anna

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had a hard time setting up pulling the two sides up require good arm strength, otherwise very sturdy, and functional
customer_reviews.author: Sobismama

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to handle.
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to open and close. Also difficult to get it all back into carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks and feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I went to youtube for an assembly video the video was about 5 min long it took me less to assemble my joovy room and it looks great just like picture it comes with a really soft blanket
customer_reviews.author: maria sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Play yard
customer_reviews.text: Gonna have a new granddaughter! Got this for a great price and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Susan McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Mattress
customer_reviews.text: For the cost you would think there would be a thicker mattress or at least 2 and a softer changing pad
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy because I read reviews about it being hard to assemble but the call BS. This was SO easy and quick. I didn’t even have to read the instructions. Best deal for a play yard- bassinet-changer.
customer_reviews.author: Lea Fulin

customer_reviews.title: ... not soft at all very very heavy would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Mattress is not soft at all very very heavy would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: linda lyons

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But unfortunately like most baby products it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! But unfortunately like most baby products it is hard to get it back in the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great if you don’t plan on using it for travel. Very difficult to assemble & would be insanely hard to take apart and put back together often. I keep it in my room for the baby and leave it assembled at all times and I love it for that purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Tia Roy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Liked everything except not all 4 sides were see through. I didn't notice until it was asembled.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Bazan

customer_reviews.title: Breakdown is impossibly complicated
customer_reviews.text: The quality is excellent and set up was easy, however breaking it down for transport/storage is awful. If you plan on moving this item for transport please buy something else and save yourself the headache
customer_reviews.author: S Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome playard
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grand daughter for when she stays at my house. Easy to assemble. Great fabric
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. It is a bit heavy but I won’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It is a bit heavy but I won’t move it much. It was easy to put assemble and I think my grandchildren will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Daina Harguess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious playpen just enough space for my daughter and her pampers and wipes
customer_reviews.author: merissa sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how people say it’s hard to assemble.. I didn’t even open the directions and it was up in no time. It’s been my main accessory in changing and sleeping for my 4 month old.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pack n play! Easy to setup and use. A bit heavy for travel but you can take out all the accessories and just travel with the actual pack n play and have an extra side pocket for sheets and blankets.
customer_reviews.author: MMiller

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Warning: not simple or easy to assemble or pack up. The people in the videos must have magic running through them. Very difficult and time-consuming to pack up.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! Very sturdy and well-made. We always take it on vacations though it is on the large side...so takes some effort.

customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, to move around, travel id needed. Its great in size and looks comfortable...cant wait for my newborn to arrive and use it.

product_meta.title: Joovy Room Playard, Nursery Center, Bassinet, Changing Table, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:RegularThe new Joovy Room Playard and Nursery Center offers convenience and functionality in a contemporary design. This premier, full-featured nursery center is a bassinet, changing station and playard, all-in-one. A notable feature is the Room's flip-away changing table, it has a sturdy and comfortable vinyl top (not fabric) so it's super easy to wipe down and can support a baby up to 25 lbs. When not in use, just flip over the changing table so it's out of your way. The full-size bassinet on the Room holds an infant up to 15 pounds. Both the bassinet and changing table are removable. The removable diaper organizer has several compartments to hold wipes, diapers, lotions and more. The giant side pocket is perfect for storing blankets or additional Joovy Room Fitted Sheets. We have included a waterproof cotton sheet that works in the bassinet or playard floor, additional fitted sheets are sold separately. The Joovy Room Playard and Nursery Center has two wheels making it easy to move around your home and it includes a zippered travel bag for when you are on the go. Ultra wide frame for zero-tip stability
feature_bullets: Flip-away changing table with sturdy vinyl top for easy cleaning supports a baby up to 25 pounds
Full-size bassinet holds infant up to 15 pounds
Diaper organizer and giant side pocket provide plenty of storage
Waterproof cotton fitted sheet and travel bag included, additional sheets sold separately
Two wheels for easy moving around your home

specifications.Care instructions: Machine-washable changing table pad makes for easy cleaning.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars441 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
